item.title: Bitunix Analyst: U.S. Trade Negotiation Rift Persists, Crypto Market in Wait-and-See Mood, BTC Support at 116,300, Resistance at 120,000, Suggests Short-Term Range Trading
item.description: July 22: U.S. Treasury Secretary Yellen declared that the U.S. is not fixated on the August 1st trade negotiation deadline and is prioritizing the quality of the agreement. She proposed that even if an agreement is not achieved by the deadline, the negotiations can persist. Nevertheless, Commerce Secretary Raimondo highlighted that August 1st is the deadline for the implementation of tariffs, and by that time, numerous countries including Brazil and Japan will be subject to high tariffs. This piece of news reflects the inconsistency within the U.S. government regarding the trade strategy. The market interprets it as continuous uncertainty in the negotiations. In response to the news, the U.S. stock market continued to reach new highs. However, investors remained vigilant about trade risks, while the crypto market exhibited high volatility.Bitunix Analyst's Advice:The short-term uncertainty in the trade negotiations may restrain the further upward potential of risk assets. Bitcoin's

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Watch: Market Volatility, Partial Whale Short Liquidation
item.description: On July 22nd, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), there were changes in the holdings of a whale in the Hyperliquid contract. Some whale short positions reduced their positions, including:The whale address starting with 0x8af700 opened a new 10x short position on FARTCOIN for approximately 3.25 million tokens, with a liquidation price of $4.603. In addition, this address holds a 40x long position on BTC with an entry price of $119,865 and a liquidation price close to $91,630; a 10x short position on SUI with an entry price of $2.32 and a liquidation price of $8.278; a 20x short position on XRP with an entry price of $2.11 and a liquidation price of $5.101.The whale address starting with 0x2ba553 increased its ETH long position by 379.33 ETH. The current profit and loss (PnL) is $7,135,553.55, and the current liquidation price is $2,413.252.The whale address starting with 0x20c2d9 reduced its ETH short position by $1.116

item.title: SafePal has partnered with 1inch to launch a Walletdrop collaboration, enhancing DeFi security and user experience.
item.description: On July 22nd, the Web3 wallet brand SafePal jointly launched 300 sets of limited-edition co-branded hardware wallets with the DEX aggregator 1inch. The aim is to enhance the security and usability of DeFi. Against the backdrop of last month's record-breaking 30% global DEX spot trading volume share, this collaboration holds significant strategic value.SafePal CEO and Co-Founder Veronica Wong stated, "In the increasingly competitive wallet market, continuous iteration and effective user incentives and retention are crucial. Since token airdrops often attract airdrop hunters and bot fake accounts, the Walletdrop activity with 1inch can help us better identify and serve the user group with genuine DeFi security needs."1inch Co-Founder Sergej Kunz said, "Self-custody is at the core of decentralization. As DeFi expands and attracts more mainstream users, advocating for a secure self-custody approach is particularly important. We are excited to collaborate with SafePal to incentivize act

item.title: 656 Bitcoins Transferred from Binance to Institutional Custody Platform Ceffu, Valued at Approximately $77.4 Million
item.description: On July 22nd, as monitored by WhaleAlert, 656 Bitcoins were transferred from Binance to the Binance institutional custody platform Ceffu, with an approximate value of $77.4 million.

item.title: Pre-market: Solana Treasury Strategy Company Leads Surge in Crypto-related Stocks, MFH Up Over 18.6%
item.description: On July 22nd, based on market information, in the pre-market trading of US stocks, the "Solana Treasury Strategy" company took the lead in cryptocurrency concept stocks. These included: Mercurity Fintech Holding (MFH), which surged by more than 18.6% after previously announcing the launch of a Solana-based treasury strategy; the "SOL version of MicroStrategy", DeFi Development Corporation (DFDV), which rose by 3.8% as it increased its holdings by 141,300 SOL yesterday, bringing its total holdings to approximately 1 million SOL; Thumzup Media Corporation (TZUP), which surged by more than 9.8% after its board approved a $250 million investment in cryptocurrency. Other cryptocurrency concept stocks had mixed performances: the "ETH version of MicroStrategy", SharpLink, fell by 1.05%; Circle fell by 1.52%; Coinbase rose by 0.18%; MicroStrategy fell by 0.3%.

item.title: The Bitcoin Treasury Company H100 Group has been approved to list on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange.
item.description: July 22: According to an official announcement, the Swedish listed company H100 Group has received approval for trading on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange (Open Market), and trading began today under the stock code GS9.Yesterday, the Swedish listed company H100 Group announced that it has increased its holdings of BTC by 140.25 BTC, and its total holdings have reached 510.28 BTC.

item.title: USDC Treasury Burns 55 Million USDC on the Ethereum Blockchain
item.description: On July 22nd, as monitored by WhaleAlert, the USDC Treasury burned 55 million USDC on the Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: Ethereum L1 Gas Limit has been increased to 45 million, significantly improving transaction throughput and scalability.
item.description: July 22nd: Based on Etherscan data, the Ethereum L1 Gas Limit has been raised to 45 million at the block height of 22968004. Approximately 50% of validators (representing nearly 500,000 staked ETH) have shown support for the increase in the gas limit, which has significantly enhanced Ethereum's transaction throughput and scalability. Previously, the Ethereum L1 Gas Limit was set at 36 million in February 2025.Yesterday, Ethereum's founder Vitalik tweeted, "Roughly exactly 50% of stakers voted to increase L1's Gas Limit to 45 million. The Gas Limit has already begun to increase and is now at 37.3 million."

item.title: Solana's Market Cap Surpasses BNB Again After Five Months, Rises to Fifth Place in Global Cryptocurrency Market
item.description: On July 22nd, based on CoinGecko data, Solana's market capitalization has once again exceeded BNB after five months and risen to the fifth position in the global cryptocurrency market capitalization ranking. Solana's current market capitalization is $107.6 billion, while BNB's current market capitalization is $106 billion.Previously, on February 23rd, BNB's market capitalization surpassed $104.2 billion and surpassed SOL to rise to the fifth position in the global cryptocurrency market capitalization ranking.

item.title: Coinbase's Wrapped Bitcoin (cbBTC) Surpasses $6 Billion in Market Capitalization, with a Circulating Supply of 53,822 Coins
item.description: On July 22nd, as per Dune Analytics, the circulating supply of Coinbase's wrapped Bitcoin, namely Coinbase Wrapped BTC (cbBTC), has reached 53,822 coins. This indicates an increase of more than 7,300 coins within the past month. The market capitalization of cbBTC has achieved a first-time milestone by surpassing $6 billion and currently stands at $6.3 billion. It has thus taken the second position as the largest wrapped Bitcoin in terms of market share, accounting for 26.2%, only second to wBTC.
